we all drink to forget

chorus
and call it an angel call it a muse

what matters most is never ever losin faith
cause its gonna be alright
youre not alone tonight

verse 2

when nothing goes as planned

seems to understand

youd give anything

cause someones listening
see keith urban liveget tickets as low as 4you might also likechorus

yeah

and call it an angel call it a muse
